<a id="ResourceImporterShaderFile"></a>

# ResourceImporterShaderFile

**Inherits:** [ResourceImporter](ResourceImporter.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Imports native GLSL shaders (not Godot Shaders) as an [RDShaderFile](RDShaderFile.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This imports native GLSL shaders as [RDShaderFile](RDShaderFile.md) resources, for use with low-level [RenderingDevice](RenderingDevice.md) operations. This importer does *not* handle ``.gdshader`` files.
